title: Bronze/Silver ELO HELL or SMURFCITY??
body:
why do i win 4 games lose 2 then back to zero points this is annoying please someone from riot like change this i'm sick of getting troll teams when on win streaks was gold 3 cant even make it to silver 3 with this point deduction if anyone comments on here about how i should get good see my fizz stats lucian stats i still lose i have a friend in high elo who still loses to silver/bronze so please tell me why it is no aloud to go and purchase a boost? or that your friends in high diamond cant help you ?? what is the point of playing in bronze/silver wen if all your skill match up is bronze silver you'll never climb playing with bad people but playing with  higher skilled players makes you a better player watching youtube does not help! it would have been ok if my points were not win 17 lose 25 ?? what are you trying to say that i should be going backwards ? should make it so each division gets a set amount of points win/loss vice versa as you climb through the ladder .

So please inform me of how to climb this ridiculous ladder when we all know bronze/silver is smurf city its pissing me off don't blame people in my shoes who buy a boost to get out of it .

Simple if you cant control "smurfing" don't make boosting a bad thing the lil guys need help once in a while 
#iwontbuyaboost#smurfing=ruinsgames

replies.body:
Looking at your stats, id say you have been plenty boosted. That account your on was Plat in season 4 and 5 and now you are "hard stuck" in silver 5... suspicious.

That account is also 4 years old and yet you don't know about MMR and keeping a positive winrate...

Fizz stats: you average** less** than 5 cs per 10. that is Bronze level farming. 2.5 K/D/A is nice, but averaging over 8 deaths is not.

Lucian stats: your last 6 Lucian games, you have died 68 times... amazing. You average more than 10 deaths a game. Your average 6 c.s. per 10 on Lucian which around a high silver level.
how do you get the cs per 10 stat?
